Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory222.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "I can't believe there's such a large cave here...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Walking into the entrance, everyone arrives at a strange underground world.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "There's a production line over there...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "That must be the where our enemies came from... No wonder the numbers don't match up.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "That doesn't make sense, though. Why would such a large cave go undiscovered for this long...?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Must be some sort of interference. Look up there—the strange lights. They must be some sort of signal jammer.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "They'd put so much effort into burying their past mistakes and building this military base, instead of trying to rebuild the ARU...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Because they had war in mind.', 3: '12', 4: "That's all in the past.", 5: '14'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'Yeah... The captain said that Amberia and the bionics were built for war from the start.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "From the looks of this cave, you can see the true intent of the ARU's leadership. They never swayed from their belief that war was the final solution.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Yeah, Diana. All in the past.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Whatever the past mistakes, let's try our best to make amends.", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Oh, how very deep and all, Forest Guards. Ah, 【kuroname】, you as well.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Oh, wha... Oh. Wait. I don't think we ever met."}
{3: 'An unfamiliar female voice warbles through the air, nauseous and muffled like noise.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Self-intros are annoooyiiing, but I guess I'll still go through with it... My name is Lamia, an Ascendant."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'First Alpha, now Lamia? Do you Ascendants think you can stroll in and out of the ARU, just as you please?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Well, we just needed something here... That's all."}
{2: 'Are you the one behind all of this?', 3: '23', 4: 'Where is Atiel?', 5: '26'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Oh, you are such a funny little tart... Didn't you just arrive at your answer? It's all the ARU's fault."}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Whether it's the bionics that are attacking the ARU,or the Amberia buried in this place—I've got nothing to do with 'em."}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "I'm just a little spectator. That's all."}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Oh come on, little pumpkin, you know the answer.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Which means... you have Atiel.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "I'm only here for Amberia. We've got enough juice, so after she's fully charged, we can make her go beep-boop with the code, and... voila!"}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Then Amberia will be under my control. After which...'}
{2: "You're just telling us that?", 3: '30', 4: "Can't you just use the virus to control her?", 5: '31'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "...I'm not tryna tell you, you're the brutes who barged in on me talking to myself! Hmph!"}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: '...Asks all the wrong questions—check.'}
{3: 'Lamia cuts the broadcast. Bionics begin pouring out of the dark recesses of the cavern.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Machine', 3: 'Urgh—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "Wait, these bionics... They've been corrupted!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'Corrupted and Ascendants... Is that Lamia trying to turn the ARU into Kowloong...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "We're here to prevent that from happening. Let's break through their forces and continue downward, Commandant.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'As you are about to move, the ice cave begins to rumble.'}
